summary: This is a Custodian Document Search Checklist related to the legal hold notice for case INMATE DEATH / LHN-CIV-2019-00204. It is a form completed by a custodian acknowledging receipt of a legal hold notice and documenting their search for potentially responsive documents across electronic files, emails, databases, hard copies, and other media. The document is marked as attorney-client privileged and confidential.

events.title: Legal Hold Notice Distribution
events.description: A legal hold notice was distributed by counsel regarding the INMATE DEATH case, instructing custodians to preserve potentially responsive documents.

keyFacts: The document is a checklist for compliance with a legal hold notice related to case 'INMATE DEATH / LHN-CIV-2019-00204'.
The legal hold notice was distributed by counsel on August 14, 2019, instructing custodians not to destroy, discard, alter, or make inaccessible potentially responsive documents.
The custodian acknowledges searching electronic files (home drives, shared drives, emails, databases), other media (CDs, DVDs, flash drives), and hard copy files in their office or repositories.
The document is marked as 'ATTORNEY CLIENT COMMUNICATION/PRIVILEGED' and 'CONFIDENTIAL'.
The custodian is asked to list other employees who may have relevant information and to identify any work-related data on personal devices.
